Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 11 Upādānagocchaka » 11.3 Upādānasampayuttaduka » 11.3.1 Paṭiccavāra » 11.3.1.1 Paccayānuloma » 11.3.1.1.2 Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
Upādānagocchaka
Upādānasampayuttaduka
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayānuloma
Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
50.
3652Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā nava, anantare cha, samanantare cha, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe cha, nissaye nava, upanissaye cha, purejāte cha, āsevane cha, kamme nava, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre nava (sabbattha nava), magge nava, sampayutte cha, vippayutte nava, atthiyā nava, natthiyā cha, vigate cha, avigate nava.
<< 11.3.1.1.2 Saṅkhyāvāraup11.3.1.2 Paccayapaccanīya >>
